### Professional Summary
With 7+ years of experience building performance-driven SaaS platforms, I specialize in
Laravel and its ecosystem. Proven track record designing commission engines,
multi-gateway payment systems, and scheduling tools used by thousands of
businessesâ€”powering over $3M in transactions. Comfortable owning entire subsystems
from architecture to rollout, applying TDD, BDD, DDD, and SOLID principles in fast-paced,
remote-first environments. Experienced across full product cycles in marketing automation,
channel rewards, and scalable admin platforms using TALL stack and Vue.js.
